ComicInfo.Summary:
Lines have been drawn and war between the Infinite Seven and Chimera has been declared. The first arc in the hit series comes to an end, but one question remains: Who will draw FIRST BLOOD? This issue is chock full of revelations, and a shock ending that will leave readers reeling!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover A | Arturo Mesa | 1 | B | Movie Poster Cover B, Limited to 1500 | Arturo Mesa | 2 | C | Artist Variant Cover C, Limited to 1500 | Axur Eneas | 3 | D | "Wolfsberg" Interlocking Cover D, Limited to 1500 | Arturo Mesa | 4 | Notes:
The Movie Poster Cover B is a homage of the movie poster for First Blood.Cover D interlock with 5 covers to be released throughout the first arc to form an Infinite Seven Poster!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-27 16:00:23. [CVDB594875]
ComicInfo.Characters: Agent Cinco, Anthony Zane, Butterface, Lars Wolfsberg, Laughing Skull, Lord Ellington, Master Zhen, Mavara, Sandsnake, Sherlock Moriarty, Statutorous Rex, Trigger Mortis, Washington
